alert.note: Alert for Ector (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:33PM CDT until July 14 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR ECTOR COUNTY... At 629 PM CDT, severe outflow winds from an associated distant thunderstorm was moving through West Odessa and Odessa at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Odessa, Goldsmith, West Odessa, Notrees, Odessa Schlemeyer Field, Penwell and Pleasant Farms. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 93 and 121. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Thick blowing dust can be expected too. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
